head.supplied: Melbourne bot Garden ¶ 24/6/71. ¶ ¶ Is it within your power, dear Mr Fitzgibbon, to oblige me with some information, in reference to the quantity of wood, sold annually (or at an average weekly) at t...

div.p: No. 1041, unit 419, VPRS 3181/P Town clerk's file series 1, VA 511 Melbourne, Public Record Office, Victoria.

Is it within your power, dear Mr Fitzgibbon, to oblige me with some information, in reference to the quantity of wood, sold annually (or at an average weekly) at the E. Market for fuel in the city? I am very anxious to collect a few more notes of this kind, to be appended to the print of my lecture.
B71.13.03. The tables of consumption are on pp. 24-5; there is no appendix.
As a matter of course I shall give you public credit for the information.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p:
Ferd. von Mueller.
MS file annotation by FitzGibbon: 'I have no information on the subject'. MS file annotation: 'Ans 27/6/71'. Letter not found.
